managewiki-desc: Allows people to manage wikis through a web interface
managewiki-disabled: This feature has not been enabled on this wiki yet.
managewiki-header-settings: This page is used to manage the wiki settings of wiki '$1'. Please note that you may not be able to change all wiki settings of this wiki, in that case you should contact a system administrator. ManageWiki is still being developed, so new features should be available in the future.
managewiki-success: The settings have been successfully changed.
